name: stardew-farm-planner
description: Interactive Stardew Valley farm planner tool

scripts.build-all: mkdir tmp && cp -R public/ tmp/public/ && cp -R electron/ tmp/ && electron-packager ./tmp Planner --platform all --out ./dist --version 1.4.3 && rm -rf ./tmp/
scripts.build-osx: mkdir tmp && cp -R public/ tmp/public/ && cp -R electron/ tmp/ && electron-packager ./tmp Planner --platform darwin --out ./dist --version 1.4.3 && rm -rf ./tmp/

author: Henrik Peinar
